text: Tsey khto vmyrayutʹ ta lyshayutʹ zhinok, yikhni vdovy budutʹ zachekaty chotyrʹokh misyatsiv ta desyaty dniv (pered tym, yak vony remarry). Odnoho razu vony fulfill yikhni tymchasovi, vy ne zdiysnyuyete pomylku dozvolyayuchy yim shchob ni spravedlyvi materialy vony bazhayutʹ zrobyty. BOH tsilkom Cognizant vse vy
